text: @drdavidsamadi 100% correct!! This is not about the virus.  The MSM and Democrats have made this a political issue.  Don't forget that the Obama administration and Dr Fauci sent $2,7 million to China to continue developing Covid-19 when it was banned here in the U.S.A.
